/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, buildings and trees can be seen, adding depth to the image. The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, and a few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The image is a beautiful representation of everyday life in this bustling city.
